annotation.spannedText: as long as you're never more than half a day away from good medical care, and you're not going to be exposing yourself to unneccesary risk, then you'll probably be fine without it

classMention.mentionClass: as long as you're never more than half a day away from good medical care, and you're not going to be exposing yourself to unneccesary risk, then you'll probably be fine without it

annotation.spannedText: Avoid dogs, avoid monkeys, avoid bats - and you will most likely be fine

classMention.mentionClass: Avoid dogs, avoid monkeys, avoid bats - and you will most likely be fine

annotation.spannedText: do a bit of google search to see where there are any current outbreaks and take that into consideration - but also take it with a grain of salt

classMention.mentionClass: do a bit of google search to see where there are any current outbreaks and take that into consideration - but also take it with a grain of salt

annotation.spannedText: get that Hep stuff and a tetanus booster

classMention.mentionClass: get that Hep stuff and a tetanus booster

annotation.spannedText: Watch the mozzies and maybe a typhoid shot

classMention.mentionClass: Watch the mozzies and maybe a typhoid shot

annotation.spannedText: Once symptoms develop, death is inevitable in all cases

classMention.mentionClass: Once symptoms develop, death is inevitable in all cases

annotation.spannedText: Vigorously wash and flush the wound site with soap and water, OR detergent OR water alone

classMention.mentionClass: Vigorously wash and flush the wound site with soap and water, OR detergent OR water alone

annotation.spannedText: Apply either ethanol OR tincture or aqueous solution of iodine

classMention.mentionClass: Apply either ethanol OR tincture or aqueous solution of iodine

annotation.spannedText: Seek the advice of local medical authorities, informing them of any vaccine you have already had

classMention.mentionClass: Seek the advice of local medical authorities, informing them of any vaccine you have already had

annotation.spannedText: If possible, take the name and address of the owner of the animal or get the local police to trace the animal urgently

classMention.mentionClass: If possible, take the name and address of the owner of the animal or get the local police to trace the animal urgently

annotation.spannedText: If possible, try and find out if the animal is healthy and if vaccinated against rabies

classMention.mentionClass: If possible, try and find out if the animal is healthy and if vaccinated against rabies

annotation.spannedText: Head and neck exposure requires treatment much sooner than when exposure occurs, for example, on the arms or legs

classMention.mentionClass: Head and neck exposure requires treatment much sooner than when exposure occurs, for example, on the arms or legs

annotation.spannedText: The 5 shots of vaccine have to be given over the period of 28 days (Day 0, 3, 7, 14 and 28) which means you have to stick around or continue with the shots in a different place

classMention.mentionClass: The 5 shots of vaccine have to be given over the period of 28 days (Day 0, 3, 7, 14 and 28) which means you have to stick around or continue with the shots in a different place

annotation.spannedText: If the series is not completed, the process will fail

classMention.mentionClass: If the series is not completed, the process will fail

annotation.spannedText: even if, like me, you've had the full round of injections, additional are required if you are exposed again (bitten, that is)

classMention.mentionClass: even if, like me, you've had the full round of injections, additional are required if you are exposed again (bitten, that is)
